name: Mount Monadnock

current_conditions.ai_summary: One of the most frequently climbed mountains in the world. Stands alone in southern NH offering commanding views.

generated_description:
The Experience

Mount Monadnock is an isolated geological giant (a 'monadnock') rising above the New England landscape. The treeless, rocky summit provides views of all six New England states on a clear day.

The Challenge

Don't underestimate it due to its popularity. The White Dot trail is essentially a rock staircase that will test your cardio and knees.

Local Insight

Reservations are now often required for parking at the state park headquarters due to high volume.

trails_config.name: White Dot and White Cross Loop
trails_config.description: One of the most climbed mountains in the world. The treeless summit offers views of every New England state.
trails_config.parking_info: Monadnock State Park Headquarters, Poole Rd, Jaffrey, NH

ui_alert.title: Reservation Required
ui_alert.message: Parking reservations are highly recommended, especially on weekends.
